<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Foxfire](/Feats.aspx?ID=2617) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kitsune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=341" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

A crack of your tail sparks wisps of blue energy. Choose either electricity or fire when you gain this feat. You gain a foxfire ranged unarmed attack with a maximum range of 20 feet. The attack deals 1d4 damage of the chosen type (no ability modifier is added to the damage roll). Your foxfire attack is in the [sling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=13) weapon group and has the [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) trait. Like other unarmed attacks, you can improve this attack with [_handwraps of mighty blows_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=441).

**Special** If you are a [frozen wind kitsune](/Heritages.aspx?ID=139), your foxfire deals cold damage instead of electricity or fire.
name: Foxfire
